name: Sanjeev Kapoor
bio: Sanjeev Kapoor is a famous Indian celebrity chef, entrepreneur and television personality. He is widely known as the 'Chef of the Nation'.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, grill or bake it, and then simmer it in tomato gravy with butter and cream.

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.cooking_method: Blanch spinach, puree it with onion and tomato, and cook it with paneer and spices.

recipes.name: Chaat
recipes.cooking_method: Boil potatoes and chickpeas, add tamarind chutney, yogurt and spices, and serve as a salad or snack.

name: Vikas Khanna
bio: Vikas Khanna is an Indian Michelin starred chef, restaurateur, cookbook writer, and filmmaker. He is one of the most influential chefs in the world.

recipes.name: Tandoori Chicken
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, spices, and lemon juice. Grill or bake it in a tandoor oven.

recipes.name: Dal Makhani
recipes.cooking_method: Boil black lentils and red kidney beans, simmerthem in tomato gravy with butter, cream, and spices, and serve with rice or naan bread.

recipes.name: Samosas
recipes.cooking_method: Make a dough with flour and water, fill it with a mixture of mashed potatoes, peas, and spices, and deep-fry until crispy.

name: Ranveer Brar
bio: Ranveer Brar is a well-known Indian chef, television personality, and author. He is widely recognized for his culinary skills and innovative recipes.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, and then cook it with basmati rice and fried onions in a sealed pot.

recipes.name: Aloo Gobi
recipes.cooking_method: Saute potatoes, cauliflower, onions, and tomatoes with spices until tender.

recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
recipes.cooking_method: Make a dough with milk powder, flour, and water, shape it into balls, deep-fry, and then soak in sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water.

name: Tarla Dalal
bio: Tarla Dalal was a well-known Indian vegetarian cookbook author and chef. She is widely known for her innovative vegetarian recipes.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate paneer, bell peppers, and onions in yogurt and spicesand grill until cooked through.

recipes.name: Aloo Paratha
recipes.cooking_method: Make a dough with flour and water, fill it with mashed potatoes and spices, and then cook on a griddle with butter and oil.

recipes.name: Chana Masala
recipes.cooking_method: Saute onions and spices, add chickpeas and tomatoes, and cook until thickened.

name: Ritu Dalmia
bio: Ritu Dalmia is a renowned chef, restaurateur, and cookbook author. She is the owner of several successful restaurants in India, and has been awarded the Order of the Star of Italian Solidarity by the Italian government for her contributions to promoting Italian cuisine in India. She is also an advocate for sustainable food practices.

recipes.name: Dal Makhani
recipes.cooking_method: Soak lentils and kidney beans, and then cook with tomatoes and spices until soft. Finish with cream.

recipes.name: Baingan Bharta
recipes.cooking_method: Roast eggplant, and then cook with tomatoes and onions until soft. Add spices and coriander.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.cooking_method: Dip ladyfingers in espresso, and then layer with a mixture of mascarpone and sugar. Finish with cocoa powder.

name: Madhur Jaffrey
bio: Madhur Jaffrey is an Indian-born actress, food and travel writer, and television personality. She is widely known for her cookbooks anddocumentaries on Indian cuisine.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, grill or bake, and then add to a tomato cream sauce.

recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.cooking_method: Cook rice with vegetables, spices, and yogurt, and then layer with fried onions.

recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
recipes.cooking_method: Mix milk powder, flour, and water into a dough, form into balls, and then fry. Soak in a cardamom and saffron flavored syrup.
